title: F1 half-term report cards
summary: McLaren Carried momentum from 2024 to soar higher, with nine wins from the first 12 races. Now, which will be its first champion driver since ’08? Oscar Piastri Points 234…

qa_pairs.question: Which team achieved nine wins in the first 12 races of the 2024 Formula 1 season?
Who is the McLaren driver mentioned as having 234 points in the 2024 season?
When was the last time McLaren had a champion driver before the 2024 season?
